page.title: 03Pendock School
page.content: Pendock School is over a 100 years old and nearly every day we do something different. In the Summer every year we have an outing to an intersting place. This year we went to Wookey Hole. Every year we go to the Three Counties Show,but we never look at the machinery. We have several TV programmes every week. Every Christmas we do a Christmas play and Easter '84 we did Alice in Wonderland. In the Winter we went to London for three days with the school, by train.The train was a hour late coming but it arrived at Paddington Station in London on time. We have three play times everday.We all enjoy life in a Village School.
